Articles.Content:
Here's a bigass satellite launcher I made. It'll put the commsat into a stable orbit of ~200km and safely return the crew! It could probably safely reach 250km+ but my goal was a 200km insertion.

First three stages are purely for vertical speed while the final stage is used to provide horizontal speed and orbit stabilization.

Pictures here: http://imgur.com/a/Mo7qn#4gDyb
